Your just sitting at home one night, and suddenly your mother comes stumbling in, drunk from a night out on the town with the girls.

"Son I'm home! And guess what i saw when i was *hicc* at the super market" she then pulls out a pack of diapers in your size from behind her back. "I think you've grown up too fast, so I'm going to regain a few years back." Your mother then stumbles and falls on you

"Mom get off me!" You shout as your mother sits on top of you. She finds your waist band and pulls down your pants.

"Oh my, what a cute bum. I bet it would look better with this diaper on haha." She said un folding a diaper and sliding it around your waist. "My this looks a lot better." Your mother then passes out on you laying on the couch.

The diaper around your hip is a weird sensation, but after a few hours, you quickly get use to it, and eventually fall asleep under your mom. When you wake up you realize...

1131222.content: Dr.Jones and Porf. Jones: both of your parents are very smart scinests with very nice jobs and important work. Naturally they were disappointed to learn you were only of average intelligence, but also didn't seem understand what that meant. Often treating you and talking to you like a toddler. Though you went to a private school your parents paid extra for a private teacher in a private classroom whose lessons didn't go beyond the first grade. You're whole school day since you started school was nothing but colors, numbers, letters, and nap and potty breaks. And at least of them checked in with the teacher daily, they talked about every thing from your behavior to going to the bathroom. It's be really embrassing if you're parents allowed you to have friends. Mother-Professor says you're not ready for that kind of uncontrolled, unknown social interaction.

Yes
You don't find your life or class wried or unordinary. You act and talk a lot like a toddler as you only been taught up to the first grade level. You don't have any friends except the teacher's son who hangs out with you during your class sometimes but your parents don't know about him
11312221.title: Prof and dr. Jones

1131223.content:
Felicia June  , a 36-year-old mother, had you when she was just barely 18, supported by your father Eric who is 38. Felicia loves you a lot and is a very much touchy-feely kind of woman who feels you are growing up too fast. On your 18th birthday, she and with the support of her husband, surprise you with diapers and an ultimatum: Become their baby or get kicked out.

Victoria Sinclair  , a 28-year-old single wealthy woman suddenly offers to adopt you, a 17-year-old boy who would normally be ignored and have to support himself in a year. Having the financial stability and support to go off to college is a dream, but it comes with a catch: You will have to wear diapers and become her baby.

Who will be your mother?
1131223.title: 17-18 (Junior-Senior)

choices: You decide to agree on certain conditions.
11312231.content:
"...that's real funny, dad," you reply sarcastically as you completed blowing out of candles. Your mother and father watched with pride in their eyes to see you grown up but as soon as you displayed disbelief at their choice of present, they frowned.

"Ted, it's not a joke. Your mother and I thought real hard and long about this. I think we're both relatively young, especially your mother for someone who is only in her mid-thirties. There's not a lot of time in the world and you've grown too fast."

"Okay, dad...stop it. The joke has gone long enough. I get it, you guys are sad and happy, but..."

You are stopped as you attempt to push the diaper they gave you away, but your mother pushed it back to you and grasped your hand gently with sad eyes.

"Sweetie, please. This isn't a joke. I...we really want you to become our baby again. I want us to take naps together, take baths together, hold you like when you were little, and...and..."

Felicia starts to tear up and it seems she can't continue making out of the words. She really misses caring for you and her emotions finally struck you that both of your parents are serious.

You gulped and then avoided staring at your mother who tried to wipe the tears from her eyes and calm herself. Eric crossed his arms and grew stern.

"Ted, I won't say this again. You have two choices and this is a present for all of us, not a punishment to you. If you don't agree, then we'll kick you out and you can live your adult life how you want, but know that you will hurt me and your mother a lot if you don't take this seriously."

You widen your eyes. You hadn't even eaten your cake that they brought but now you weren't sure if you were hungry for dessert.

"I...W-why are you doing this? I...I still don't understand. I've just turned Eighteen, but...you want me to be a baby?!"

"Yes," Eric says firmly and rubs the back of his wife as she sniffles, "...but it's more than just being a baby. I want you and your mother to enjoy each other. You've hardly spent time with her or me these past few years. You come home from school, lock yourself in your room, talk with us once a while during dinner, spend time with your friends. Why are you so distant?!"

"I...I don't know. I'm sorry, but still, this shouldnt-"

"It should," Eric interrupted, knowing that you were thinking their ultimatum is uncalled for, "Now, what will it be?"
11312231.title: Felicia June

choices: You wanted your mother to sexually relieve you.
113122313.content:
This was completely unnecessary and even wrong to some degree, but...there was also a window of opportunity. They really seemed to want you to be accepting their decision and...maybe you could be given the right conditions.

"Fine, I'll agree to this, but only on a few conditions!"

Eric raised an eyebrow, surprised at your agreement. Even Felicia quickly stopped sniffling.

"Sweetie, really?" she asked, hopefully, "...if it will make you comfortable, then we'll accommodate you, I promise."

Eric nodded in agreement with his wife.

You are a little happy that they aren't stubborn and expecting you to become their baby without anything in return. What did you want?
113122313.title: You decide to agree on certain conditions.

choices: She agrees, deciding she can take care every aspect of your life.
She can't go that far. You are kicked out.
1131223132.content:
You are feeling a rising anger in your heart the more you think about how unreasonable your parents' request is. Why would you regress for them just because of your mother's feelings?

As for your father, he's been always the one to suck up to his wife. To think he sees nothing wrong with this makes you feel even angrier. At this point, you want to gain some benefit out of this if you are going to become the family "baby" again. If not, then you'll accept being kicked out.

'I may be slapped or kicked out for saying this, but I don't care anymore!' you think, glaring at your father as you make your first demand.

"Dad, if you really want me to become a baby again for mom, then I want her to sexually relieve me from now on!"

Your father's eyes bulge at your demand and he couldn't help raise his voice. "What?!"

You shiver, but you've already resolved yourself to leave the house or stay as their baby. "Kick me out, dad. I dare you. If you're going to force me to wear diapers and become a baby, then mom has to take responsibility for my needs!"

"S-she's your mother! How could you say that?!"

Felicia stares, shocked with her hands over her mouth. Knowing this directly relates to her, you avoid looking at her out of shame. She's pretty and well-endowed. You've largely avoided trying to think about her, but the thought of restarting a relationship with you makes you want to take all that you could get.

"Dad, I love her too if I'm honest," you state firmly, clenching your first, "...and I don't think you're that bad a father either, so maybe it's better that you kick me out or stop sucking up to her wishes. If my demand is unreasonable, so this so-called present of yours!"

Eric is infuriated beyond belief and at this point, he'd rather kick you out now; however, his wife is more emotionally attached to you. Knowing this, he grits his teeth and urges her to respond.

"Honey, this is impossible. He's not willing to become our baby at this point. You can't say this is what you want either, huh?"

Felicia stares at you in silence, confused, afraid, and also happy. She seriously contemplates what it means to take care of you again. What does she decide?
1131223132.title: You wanted your mother to sexually relieve you.

choices: He decides to kick you out anyways.
He reluctantly agrees for his wife's sake.
He goes out for a bit to think.
11312231321.content:
"Sweetie, are you...sure you want this?" Felicia asks after a few seconds of silence.

Eric stares at his wife incredulously as she actually considers their son's demand.

"Felicia, you can't be..."

"Honey, it's only fair," Felicia turns to her husband and smiles, "...I want us to be closer and he's only saying the same thing. You know what we're asking is unreasonable, so I'm happy that he's willing to accept becoming our little one again."

"But, this is...wrong! That's not how a baby is treated!" Eric argues.

You cross your arm, a little happy that your beautiful mother is essentially agreeing. You can't help but defend yourself. "Dad, you think an Eighteen-year-old can become a baby?! Please! If you can't agree with mom this time and refuse to support her wishes, then I guess it's adios for me, isn't that right?"

Eric turns around and knocks his head against the wall. Now, his wife and son are on the same wavelength, he feels completely betrayed.

What does he do?
11312231321.title: She agrees, deciding she can take care every as...

113122313212.content:
After a moment of silence as Eric leans his head on the wall, he straightens up but doesn't turn around to face his wife or son.

"Fine," he agrees, much to your shock, "...but, you will respect your mother, do you hear? She loves you and...it's clear you love her more than I realized. It's also clear that you're her baby and not mine. I...love you both, so just...don't push me away."

You hear his voice crack and start to feel guilty. Felicia comes to his side and rubs his back in consolation. "Sweetie, today is meant to be a celebration! I love you and our son...no, baby so much! Let's just be cheerful, okay?"

Felicia is genuinely overjoyed, getting quickly over the fact that you lust for her. It appears her maternal desire may even support such taboo relationship anyways, if not over time.

Eric takes a breather but doesn't say anything more. He finally turns to look at you with sad eyes. You feel even more guilty, but refuse to let up on your demand.

Your legs are shivering and you realize you've spent all our courage to demand something so absurd. You honestly didn't believe it could get you this far, but now it seemed there would be no turning back.

"That's all, I hope?" Eric questions, "If so, then Felicia will change you into a diaper now."

You bite your lips, wondering if you should push your luck given your strongest demand so far. What do you do?
113122313212.title: He reluctantly agrees for his wife's sake.

At first you thought it was all a big prank, Rose and you bought the diapers, drove home, moved them to her room, and that was that. She asked for her panties back in a manner that sounded like she'd forgiven you, and that was the end of it. Until this morning.

"Wake up baby!" You hear, "I let you off the hook last night, but today is when the game begins." You open your eyes, its Rose on top of you in your bed. You open your eyes more to see a diaper in her hand and an excited look on your face.

121.title: Toddler (3-5)

122.content:
Choose a kid who will be the main character in this story.

Nicole
A very cute little girl. She has very pale skin, blue eyes, and long blonde hair. Her Dad just got sent to jail for getting drunk and beating up a cop, so Nicole has to live with her "Evil" Aunt Sandra and her older cousin Mallory for a few months until Dad gets out. Aunt Sandra is rather strict and tends to give out bizarre and unorthodox punishments for minor things.

Andrea
A short girl, dark tan skin, black hair, rather skinny. She's a little bit shy and nerdy, and her eyesight isn't great. She is supposed to wear glasses at school but hates glasses and never wears them. She wets the bed and has to wear diapers at night, but lately she's been having accidents during the day too. Andrea is very self-conscious about her situation and would probably try to hide her diapers if possible. Her mother, on the other hand, secretly finds it amusing to make Andrea uncomfortable and humiliated.
122.title: Kid (6-12)

choices: Wipe Andrea down and diaper her
Make Andrea take a bath first
Andrea begs Mom not to put her in diapers
1222.content:
Andrea was in her room writing a cute little story about her pet cat going on an adventure. She was a very creative girl with an active imagination, and couldn't wait to show her mommy how hard she worked on it. Andrea was wearing a cute little pink sleepless shirt that showed off her tummy, and a red pair of shorts. She usually liked to wear light clothing.

As Andrea worked on her story, she suddenly felt a strong, irresistible urge to pee. Andrea stood up, but it was too late. She wet herself and tears soon escaped her eyes. Warm ,fresh urine dripped down her legs. Andrea hated this. She had been having accidents more and more often lately. Normally she only wet herself at night, but now she was beginning to have daytime accidents too... and she'd even pooped her pants yesterday!

Little Andrea scurried to her mother, who was off in the living room watching TV. She gave Mom a tearful look.
"M... Mommy... I had another accident." Andrea said.
Mom nodded, noting the large dark damp spot on her daughter's shorts. She was a short woman, for an adult, but she still towered over little Andrea. Like Andrea, Mom had dark tan skin and long obsidian hair. She stood up and took Andrea's hand.
"Come on, let's get you cleaned up." She said, leading her daughter to the bathroom.

What does Mom do first?
1222.title: Andrea

123.content:
Time to start listing off potential protagonists o choose from.

1. Heather
13 years old, very pale, skinny, scrawny, and weak. She has brown hair, blue eyes, small mostly undeveloped breasts, she's not quite blossomed yet. Heather still wets the bed, even at this age, and is extremely self-conscious about it. Her older sister Rena likes to bully poor little Heather and humiliate her, and Heathers bedwetting and small breasts are often the subject of her bullying (Rena, who is 17, is much more developed than Heather, as well as being much taller and stronger since she plays Varsity Volleyball at school). Mom often makes Heather wear diapers to bed, which Rena relentlessly mocks her for.

2. Natalie
15 years old, blonde hair, blue eyes, slightly athletic body. Has small but pronounced breasts. A little bit on the short side but not unusual for a girl her age. Natalie is a freshman in high school and wants to join the Junior Cheerleader Squad. However, as is tradition, Freshmen joining the Cheer Squad get relentlessly hazed and humiliated as part of the secret initiation. Natalie and some of the other Cheerleader girls will spend the night at one of the girls' houses for a sleepover, where Natalie will be diapered, humiliated, and treated like a baby. It happens to all Freshman Cheerleaders. It's a tradition.

choices: Heather starts having accidents during the day

The family is visiting a waterpark
1231.content:
Heather was asleep in her bed, warmly curled up in her blankets. She was wearing a small sleeveless T-shirt that didn't do much to cover her up, and a thick, white urine-soaked diaper. Her peaceful slumber was soon broken, when someone began knocking at her bedroom door.
"Oh, is it time to get up already?" Heather moaned as the sound woke her up.
Heather sat up in bed as her older sister Rena stepped into her room.
"Time to get up, scrawny. Ha ha!" Rena laughed.
Heather stretched and yawned.
"So, need your diaper changed, wet girl?" Rena said, with a wicked smile.
"Ugh, Rena, it's too early for this." Heather said.
Rena laughed.
"Why even ask, I can smell you already." Rena said.
Heather groaned. She knew she was a gross loser, but she didn't need to be reminded first thing in the morning. Still groggy, Heather got up to go towards the shower to clean up.

What makes this day special and unique?

Heather moved passed her sister and headed to the bathroom to shower and get cleaned up for school.

She was soon dressed and headed downstairs for breakfast. Rena stuck her foot out in front of Heather, causing her to stumble. “Watch where you are doing baby sister. You could hurt yourself.”

Heather stuck her tongue at her before grabbing toast and heading to the bus stop.

choices: Lay a dress and a diaper on the bed.
12312.content:
Heather only had enough time to get her shirt off as Rena storms in and grabs her hand.
“Hurry up pumpkin, Mom and Dad are leaving and want to say BYE.”

“What? Hey!” Heather shouts, still tired as her sister drags her to the main hall of the big house.
She blush deep red when she sees her reflection in the big mirror. Only dressed in her wet diaper, she lifts her hands to cover her chest.

“Pff, what do you try to hide, baby?” Rena snarls and rolls her eyes.

Right by the door, their parents are waiting beside their luggage.
“Good morning sleepy head, we wanted to say goodbye. You remember, that we will be away for a week, maybe a bit longer – and your sister is in charge until we are back?!” Her father says.

Heather nods her head and quickly run to him to hug him.
He is a bit surprise and hugs his daughter, kissing her forehead and rubbing her back.
“It will be fine baby.” He says calmly and sends her over to his wife.

Her mother gives her a kiss on the cheek and shakes her head.
“Really, you could at least get out of your night-time diaper to say goodbye.”

“I tried to, but…”. Heater tried to explain, but Rena stops her.
“But she was late – as always.”

Their parents shrug and wave to them, as they leave the house.

Finally Heather can take a shower.

As she comes back to her room, only wearing a towel she find her sister, Rena…

This diaper was thicker and had print on it. Heather stepped back. “I am not wearing that.” She said firmly. She was not going to be a plaything for her sister. Heather crossed her arms around her towel.

“Yes, you are. I am not going to spend my time cleaning up your accidents.” Said Rena as she grabbed the wipes and powder not looking at her sister.

“I have not had a day accident in over a year.” Stated Heather boldly.

“You are lying, you and I both know it. So you will wear a diaper during the day. I am not forcing you to use it. If you need to go potty. You can tell me and I will take you. Now you either going to put it willingly or I will force you into them, but not without spanking you bare butt and then you will not have potty privileges until I say so. So what will it be?” Asked Rena

She taped the diaper securely. She patted the front of the diaper. “Now little Heather will not have no accident will she. She knows she needs her diapee” said Rena in a baby voice.

1. You are not allowed to touch the diaper. If you need to use the restroom or a change. I will take you and change you.

12312211.content:
Heather nods her head and sobs. She can’t beat her sister in any way and need time to think about a way to survive the week without being treated like a baby the whole time.

She waits until her sister is out of her room, before she lifts her dress again and take a closer look at the diaper.
“I wonder where she got that diaper from.” She asks herself and sits down at her computer. It only takes her ten minutes to find the diaper in a VERY strange shop for diapers and other stuff for ABDL. She has no clue what ABDL stands for, but that only requires another ten minutes to find out.
“Oh, I hope she bought no other stuff for me.” Heather prays and wonders why her sister spend so much money on humiliating her.
She hopes her sister had not bought many of those thick diapers, since she waddles around and don’t even think about leaving the house in them. Her plan is to stay inside, destroy every diaper when she is allowed to go to the toilet and hope her sister run out of them very soon.

Satisfied with her strategy, she lies down on the bed and reads a book.

“Hey nerd, Go and buy me some milk, eggs and bread, out parents did not fill up the stock before they left.” Rena storms in, give out her order and walks out again.

So much for Heathers plan… .
She takes an extra coat, even when the temperatures were too high for that and slowly walks to the shop at the need of the street. She walks slowly, since she don’t want to waddle that obviously, but she can’t walk too slowly, because she feels the need to pee and need to return soon.

In the shop she meet some friends from school. They ask her about her coat and Heather tell them, that she has a little cold. That keeps them on distance and prevent her from more questions. Especially when she fakes a sneeze rolls her eyes.

On the way back from the shop, she walks faster, because she really needs to pee now. The diaper is rubbing between her legs and makes her crotch tinkle. She tries to avoid the rubbing sensation, by waddling more, but that slows her down and she has serious doubts that she is back in time.

Finally she reach the house, set the groceries down in the kitchen and call her sister.
“Rena, I need to pee. Can I take off the diaper?”
She waits a little while, but her sister does not answer. Desperate Heather waddles to the bathroom and think about taking the diaper off herself. In the end, it is not her fault, when her sister does not answer.

Heather tried over and over to get the tape off the diaper. She could not grip the tape to remove it. She squirmed and Whined. “Rena, I need to, you the potty. Please, I need to pee.” whined Heather as she did the potty dance.

“What are you yelling about?” Asked Rena as she walked into the bathroom.

“I need to pee. I need this diaper off.” Whined Heather as she pointed to the diaper.
123122113.title: She has issues to get the diaper off

choices: “Yes, I better change you into something thicker.”
“Disgusting, but no need to change you yet.”
1231221133.content:
Rena smiles from ear to ear and slows down in her movements.
“Well, if the little baby likes to have her diaper off, than she should ask like a baby. By the way, if you take that diaper off by yourself I will spank you until you can’t sit down anymore.”

Heather jumps from one feet to the other and let go off the tape.
“Please Rena, I need to pee super badly. Please take off the diaper.”

Rena smiles, but stays where she is.
“Nope, not good enough.”

Heather thinks about it, but hesitates to say it. This is so humiliating:
“Pweath big sista, can you pleath take my diapie off?”
She plays the dumb little baby and make her sister laugh.

“That sound much better.” She grins, come to her sister, and push her on the toilet.
“I better not risk anything before I take that diaper off.” She says and starts to nibble with the tapes. Heather hears one tape open, but then her sister tapes her close again.
“I need to lose them before I take them off all at once.” Rena grins, and push down on Heathers lower belly while she grab the second tape.

That pressure is too much for Heather and her floodgates open and her hot pee stream into the waiting diaper.

Rena is very close to her and notice it right away. She stops everything and steps back.
“Looks like the little baby waited too long to call her sitter. Now you down, need to take that diaper off any longer.”

The diaper hangs heavy between Heathers legs as she gets up.
“Can you change me now? This is disgusting”

Rena nods hear head.
1231221133.title: Rena wants her to ask like a baby

choices: She wants to go to the waterpark too
Rena had other plans for today
She only wants to come with them if she can invite a friend
12313.content:
After the shower, Heather felt refreshed and ready for a new day, hoping her stupid sister was allready done with her daily dose of teasing.

She went to the kitchen for a breakfast with her family.

"How about we go to the waterpark today, its a lovely day and we still havent been there" asked her mom.

"Oh yeah that would be great!" cheered Heather.
Since the huge new waterpark had opened a few weeks before Heather always wanted to see it.
Even if it would mean she had to wear her stupid old childish swimsuit in light blue with the pink seams which make her look even younger. She always asked her mom for a new swimsuit or even a bikini, but her mom always said that this one is fine as long as she fits in.

So it was settled that Heather and her mom would go there today, but then her mom also asked Rena if she wanna come with them.
Heather hoped her sister would say no so she could have a peaceful day alone with her mom.

How Rena responsed?
12313.title: The family is visiting a waterpark

choices: Nope, they arrive with no incidents
Her mom told her something when they are on the way
123132.content:
" No mom,I'll meet david later...and if i want to go there i could drive there anytime i want, i dont need someone to take me everywhere like my babysister..." she answered.

Heather of course felt offended by this comment, but her mood brightened up anyway since this meant she doesnt have to see her sister for a couple of hours.

"Okay fine", said her mom, "go pack your stuff and dont forget your swimsuit, Heather"

A couple of minutes later it was all set and Heather and her mom get into the car.


Anything happens on their car ride?
123132.title: Rena had other plans for today

1231321.content:
Everything was good and there was even no long waiting line at the entry.

They get there tickets and went straight to the changing area where they take a family cabin.

After Heather got dressed in her swimsuit, the mirror at the door painfully reminded her on her underdevelopment.
Anyhow, she was here to have a good time and a lot of fun!

Mother and daughter got out of the cabin to enter the main area of the waterpark with all kinds of pools for big and littles,swimmers and nonswimmer with waterslides, giant swimming plastic animals to climb and many more!

They where just about to look around where to go first when a pool attendant stopped them.
"Excuse me madam...may i ask how old the girl is?"

"She is 13, why?" Heathers mom said.

"Oh nevermind, I'm sorry. I didnt thought that your daughter is this age...so I guess its irrelevant..."

"What is irrelevant?" Heathers mom asked out of curiosity before the attendant had a chance to leave.

"Oh its nothing...we just...well, when we see young guests we just have to ask there parents how reliable they are potty trained. It an order from the managment, we are just opened and very prudent about to keep everything clean here and we have high fines for..., nevermind madam..i wish you and your adorable daughter a wonderful stay here!

How Heathers mom reacts?
1231321.title: Nope, they arrive with no incidents

12313211.content:
The attendant wha was about to leave, turned around again.
"Are there any problems, madam?..." He asked with a raise eyebrow.

"So...you mean...if a child has an accident..."
"..it gets pricey..yes madam...and we have some chemicals in the water who make it easy for us to find out.."
Heathers mom cleared her throat.." So you mean if i would have a child who might have an accident..."
Oh, no worries madam..for that cases we offer a lot of different swimdiapers, well unfortunatly they dont hold everything, but when we see a child is protected we dont charge a fine, because everyone is welcome here!" The attendant smiled and finaly walked away.

When Hether saw her mom pondering she began to panic

"Mom! dont even think about that!" she shouted

"You heard the man, Heather if something happnes and youre not protected.."
"I'm not a baby! there is no way I wear a stupid swim dia.." she suddenly stopped, not wanting to let anyone else hear what they are talking about.

"It either that or we drive back home immediatly" Her mom said strictly
12313211.title: "uhmm...well..."

choices: Run into a group of (mean) kids.
Is guided to the babies pool.
123132112.content:
Away from her bully sister and Heather is still pushed around, this time by her mother. She can’t stand it and throws a tantrum.
“Mom, no! Forget about it! I don’t wear a fuxxking diaper in the pool where everybody can see me!”

Heathers mom is shaking her head and grabs her by the ear. “No talking back little girl! Almost every day you wake up wet and your sister told me, that you hide a row of accidents that you had during the day, too.”
This is all a lie, but Heather can non proof it right now.
“Mom, no! Rena is a bitch and liar!”

Her mother however has heard enough or her and pulls her over her knee. Five slaps later, Heather is a sopping mess and agrees to everything, only to have the spanking stopped.

The attendant is still very relaxed and hands out a big swim diaper in pink.
“See, it even matches your two-piece swimsuit.” Her mom smiles and drags her still sopping daughter into the changing rooms.
In there the nightmare continues, since the pants does not fit over the thick diaper and five minutes later, Heather finds herself in a bikini bra, that hides basically nothing and a thick swim diaper, standing in the waterpark.

At least the slides and pools looks like fun. Heather…
123132112.title: Heather throws a tantrum

12313221.content:
Heather sat in the front seat of the car. She was so excited she forgot to go to the bathroom. She listened to the radio with her mother in the car as her mother drove.

When the car hit the freeway the urge to use the bathroom hit her. She started to squirm in the seat. “How much further mom?” Asked Heather trying to not to wet herself.

“We are about ten minutes away when traffic clears up. Why, what is wrong?” Asked her mother.

“Nothing.” Said Heather refuses to let her mother know she need to pee.

When they hit the exit ramp, Heather loses control. She muttered “No, no, no.” as her shorts started to get darker as she wet herself like a toddler. “Mom, I had an accident.” Whined Heather.

Her mother looked at Heather and let out a sigh as this was nothing new. She pulled into the...
12313221.title: Pee

124.content:
Kristi Evans-
22 year old college student. A short game skinny girl. She just started to work at the daycare that her roommate, Tracy, works at. Through situations ends up being treated as more of a charge than a caregiver.

Maggie Bells-
An office woman, 26, who had been having trouble with stress and started to wet the bed again. Her boss, Jennifer, finds out and starts to make Maggie office and personal life change for better or worse.
124.title: Adult (18 and up)

choices: Read a story to the toddlers
1241.content:
Kristi was following her roommate around the daycare. She was so excited about this job. She needed some extra cash due to college and this would help with her degree in teaching. She waved at all the small children at the daycare as Tracy showed her the restrooms and changing tables. “This is where we change the toddlers and babies.” Said Tracy in a cheerful voice. Kristi smiled as she looked at the changing room. She saw the table were sturdy enough they could easily hold her.

After the tour of the daycare, which took about a hour, Kristi decided to...
1241.title: Kristi

choices: Hold it and continue to read to them
12412.content:
Kristi decided she would get the toddlers together and read them a story. “Hey, it is story time. Do someone want to get a book for me?” Asked Kristi as she sat down in the story time chair and waited for a book to read.

She decided to read the book ‘Green Eggs and Ham’ that one of the little girls gave her. Heather started to read the story and even threw in voices for each character. The children loved it. At the end of the story, Kristi needed to pee. She was going to get up, but another child brought her the book ‘The Lorax’. They asked her to read her the book.
12412.title: Story time

info.brief_description: Somebody forces you into diapers, but for what reason?
info.description: who puts you in diapers and why?
